definitions.text: a signal transmitted along a narrow path; guides airplane pilots in darkness or bad weather
long thick piece of wood or metal or concrete, etc., used in construction
a group of nearly parallel lines of electromagnetic radiation
a column of light (as from a beacon)
the broad side of a ship
examples: they sighted land on the port beam

definitions.text: a gymnastic apparatus used by women gymnasts
smile radiantly; express joy through one's facial expression
emit light; be bright, as of the sun or a light
examples: The sun shone bright that day
The fire beamed on their faces

definitions.text: express with a beaming face or smile
broadcast over the airwaves, as in radio or television
examples: We cannot air this X-rated song

definitions.text: have a complexion with a strong bright color, such as red or pink
examples: Her face glowed when she came out of the sauna

definitions.text: experience a feeling of well-being or happiness, as from good health or an intense emotion
